ns0:DescribedValueSet.ns0:Purpose: (Clinical Focus: This grouping value set contains diagnoses used to identify with an active diagnosis of acute myocardial infarction.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify an active diagnosis of AMI. The QDM Category linked to this value set: Condition / Diagnosis / Problem),(Inclusion Criteria: Include all diagnosis codes describing an active AMI utilizing ICD 9 CM, ICD 10 CM, and SNOMED CT codes.),(Exclusion Criteria: The value set specifically excludes for Acute Atrial Infarction; also exclude codes that do not meet the inclusion criteria.)
ns0:DescribedValueSet.ns0:Definition: (2.16.840.1.113762.1.4.1045.182:Acute Myocardial Infarction I10),(2.16.840.1.113883.3.666.5.1955:Acute Myocardial Infarction SM),(2.16.840.1.113883.3.666.5.1957:Acute Myocardial Infarction I9)
